```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
game_data = read.csv('/Users/zoepratt/Documents/GitHub/Top-Chess-Players/data/player_piece_sac_data.csv')

game_data %>% count(player)
```

```{r}
ggplot(game_data, aes(x = player, y = moves))+
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
ggplot(game_data, aes(x = player, y = total_sac))+
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
cor(game_data$total_sac, game_data$moves)
```
